column1: I'm sure glad my dog isn't gay.
Hey Stan, your dog been to any Pride marches lately?
Hey Stan, you look almost pretty enough to kiss.
Huhuh, Okay Ms., Ms. Jones, heh, me and Doctor... Flick here just need to... check your vagina.
Detectives!  If you don't get out of here, we're gonna rip the doll's head off!
We were playing gynecologists and now we're playing criminals
No, 'cause I got... special wizard armor on.
Oooh, they got me!  Whooaaa, whooaaa, whooaaa.
